name: Shounen Deconstructed
description: Shounen media has changed a lot over the years - or has it? Get to the bottom of what makes shounen SHOUNEN in “Shounen: Deconstructed”!

name: An Introduction to Character Archetypes in Anime & Popular Culture
description: Join the Real Adults as they define and discuss character archetypes in anime and popular culture, and how/why they are used in storytelling.

name: ANIME LIP SYNC BATTLE
description: Back for its 3rd year, it's Anime Lip Sync Battle! Hosted by Agape and Miles, we're ready to show off 10 new songs for you to lip sync for your life! Winner will receive a $25 gift card to Joann's to help your cosplay project! All participants receive a treat as well!

name: Let's Talk Fontaine: Law, France, and Folklore
description: Calling all Genshin Impact Fontaine lovers! Come join us for a discussion about the cultural elements and legal system in Fontaine!

name: Anime Conventions of Years Past
description: Curious about the history of anime conventions like the one you are at right now? Ever wanted to experience what it was like to go to a con at different points in history? Join us on a journey through the rapid evolution of anime conventions and the people who attend them!

name: Bungo Stray Dogs Game Night
description: Come hang with members of the ADA, Port Mafia, and others for some fun sleepover games and stories! Minimal war crimes will be committed, a good time will be had by all!

name: Karaoke
description: Come request your favorites and end the night in song!

name: Cinema of the Rising Sun: How to Get Into Japanese Film
description: Interested in learning more about Japanese culture through its rich history of film? Join us as we show you how to discover your next favorite film!

name: Literary Analysis of Bungo Stray Dogs
description: Have you ever wondered what those old books the BSD characters' abilities are based on are about? Come for a discussion of some famous and possibly great works of literature!

name: Domain Expansion Touchdown: The NFL for Anime Fans
description: Think football is just a boring sportsball for your dad? Think Again! Football is the nerdiest and most anime sport around, and to prove it I'm going to explain it using exclusively Anime references and comparisons.

name: Hey... Do That Again!
description: Execution is everything when you're creating Pink Tsundere #9827.

name: Rating Your OTPs: Ship or Skip?
description: Need someone to harshly judge your favorite pairings from series you love? Come to this panel and watch Petrichor either praise or crush your dreams!

name: Utena Did It First
description: Katy is back and ready to talk about Revolutionary Girl Utena… again! Join her for an hour long dive into the influences Utena had on the anime industry and trends she started.

name: Introduction To One Piece
description: This panel is for individuals interested in the hit anime, manga, and live action series One Piece, but are confused on which adaption to start, and are intimidated by its length. Each adaptation will be reviewed and an overview of the series will be presented.

name: Unsolved “Mister”ies
description: Unsolved “Mister”ies: Sleuths, you are on the case to solve what is the next mystery anime you should watch.  Join us as we investigate popular series, like Bungo Stray Dogs, to figure out what makes this genre alluring.

name: Modern Midoriyama: a History of Ninja Warrior/Sasuke
description: Since the 1990's, Ninja Warrior has grown from a televised obstacle competition, into a globally loved sport, with representations found in various countries. Join us as we explore the history of this sport - the origins, the champions, and how has evolved and adapted into media today!

name: Our Manga Library
description: Want to take a break with a good story? Visit Our Manga Library with over 400 volumes of manga to choose from.

name: ScottyFest
description: Come see a variety of talented performers on the main stage! Featuring: Lydia Yang, Zhuowen Huang, Sonya Simkin, Mio Chen, Miffy, Mara Barron, FRESA, Lisa, Lydia Yang, PopCultureChoreography, Star Wars Club, Why did we play Haruhikage?

name: Guest of Honor: Sheeno Mirin | StudioGnu
description:
Join us for our special guest panel, where they will discuss interdisciplinary approaches to music and technology, as well as insights into Vocaloid culture from a creator's perspective. 

We will also be hosting a music video showcase highlighting the works of Sheeno Mirin and Studio Gnu, beginning 15 minutes before the panel.

name: Video Game and Anime Flute Performance
description: Video Game and Anime Cosplaying Flute Player (who plays games fast) performs your favorite video game and anime tunes!

name: Masquerade
description: Join us for our annual Masquerade! Watch as cosplayers from all over show off their hard work and craftsmanship on stage, in an walk-on á la fashion show style. Cheer on your favorites!

name: CMU Jazz Club Performance
description: Our mission is to create an environment and provide musicians with the means to explore and develop their interests in the American art form of jazz. We also aim to share our music with the CMU community, providing live entertainment, a relaxing setting, stress relief, and a community of people to spend time with.

name: Anime Trivia
description: Test your anime knowledge in our anime trivia Kahoot! Win prizes!

name: J-Pop Band Performance
description: Recently formed band that cover キリンジ (Kirinji), a band from the 2000s best known for their album “3”. Their songwriting is characterized by complex, interesting, yet accessible harmonies.

name: Wind Ensemble Performance
description: The Tartan Wind Ensemble performs music from Howl's Moving Castle, Touhou Project, and Undertale! We're a student-run non-major no-audition ensemble that meets every Sunday and Wednesday to play fun music -- our full concert is tomorrow at 11am in the UC Studio Theater if you're still in town!

name: Arcade
description: Presented by Rhythm Games Club and in partnership with Ikigai Arcade, ScottyCon's selection of rhythm game cabinets will be available in Studio Theatre from 11 AM-9 PM. The list of cabinets include: maimai FiNALE, Sound Voltex, Jubeat, Beatmania IIDX, Ongeki, Wacca (x2), Chunithm, and Nostalgia

name: Arcade & Games
description: Come play 20 years' worth of CMU student games! You can play on Arcade, Switch, Console or PC. We have a wide variety of games that will satisfy your gamer needs.

name: Smash @ ScottyCon 2025
description: Smash at ScottyCon is back! Enjoy a variety of platform fighter games to compete in with Smash Bros Ultimate, Smash Bros Melee, and the newly released Rivals of Aether 2. Feel free to play casually with your friends as well!

name: Learn Mahjong!
description: New to mahjong, or just want to play? Join us to learn more about one of the most popular board games in Japan.

name: Play D&D!
description: Some drop-in drop-out games of D&D, open to players of all experience levels!

name: Crafts in Cosplay
description: Sew a Scotty dog plush and create perler bead designs with cosplay club! Also, visit our photobooth and take snazzy photos. Available all day during non-café hours.

name: Fun With Folds
description: Stop by the Origami Club table for a fun folding session! Fold whatever you like or ask an officer to teach you a model, like the origami Scotty or a fun anime themed model, like Pikachu or Hatsune Miku!

name: Imperial March
description: Meet Jedi and Sith at our table, and spill the secrets of a galaxy far, far away.

name: Movie Screening: Look Back
description:
Popular, outgoing Fujino is celebrated by her classmates for her funny comics in the class newspaper. One day, her teacher asks her to share the space with Kyomoto, a truant recluse whose beautiful artwork sparks a competitive fervor in Fujino. What starts as jealousy transforms when Fujino realizes their shared passion for drawing.

Based on the acclaimed manga by Tatsuki Fujimoto, the creator of “Chainsaw Man”, Look Back captures the highs and lows of pursuing artistic excellence and the special bonds formed through creative collaboration. The heart-wrenching story is the stunning feature-length directorial debut from Kiyotaka Oshiyama that will leave you in tears and inspire you to chase your own artistic dreams.

name: Artist Alley
description: At anime and comic conventions, the artist alley is a section for independent artists to display and sell their work. There will be 90+ CMU student artists selling original and fan merch at ScottyCon's artist alley!
